com.github.javacliparser

Class AbstractOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.javacliparser.AbstractOption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Option, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractClassOption, AbstractClassOption, FlagOption, FloatOption, IntOption, ListOption, MultiChoiceOption, StringOption

    public abstract class AbstractOption
extends java.lang.Object
implements Option
    Abstract option.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
